alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 1:01PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Pima and west central Cochise Counties through 145 PM MST... At 100 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Vail to near Kartchner Caverns State Park. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benson, Vail, Saguaro National Park East and Mescal. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 280 and 303. Route 83 between mile markers 56 and 58. Route 90 near mile marker 290. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
